description:
This IPK360 program offers advanced communications training for engineers who have a drive for professional excellence and a passion for addressing new frontiers in engineering. This course aims to accelerate your professional development by teaching you to manage rapid change in a fast moving global, technological, multi-cultural and multi-disciplinary work environment. Through this course we will bring you up to date on communication skills you need to work in highly virtualized environments, within distributed teams and across cultures. If you love technology and want to advance your career in engineering this course is for you.

This course provides an introduction to the skills-gaps training model for engineers, changing nature of communications in engineering, understanding cross-cultural competence, cross-cultural communications in engineering and acquiring cultural competence through life-long learning.
title: Communications Training for the Next Generation Professional
